name: Alpinist VS The Alien Invasion in Mount Roraima
name_original: Alpinist VS The Alien Invasion in Mount Roraima
description:
An Alpinist was climbing Mount Roraima, however, an alien invasion just happened!

Using a stolen alien cannon, how long can he defend himself?

This game is open source!

Note: An update was made after the jam end, this update doesn't changed any gameplay code, it was only a bugfix that was necessary for the web build.
